Posts.EditableText: A Release Candidate (that is, "finished, I think!") build of Quest 4.1 is now available. Quest Pro users: http://www.axeuk.com/mydownloads Quest users: http://www.axeuk.com/quest/quest410.exe This version fixes all bugs that have been reported so far, and also features fully updated documentation and tutorial. If there are no issues found, this will be the version that is released next weekend, on Sunday 19th July. So please let me know if you find any bugs!
Posts.HTML:
A Release Candidate (that is, "finished, I think!") build of Quest 4.1 is now available.

Quest Pro users: http://www.axeuk.com/mydownloads
Quest users: http://www.axeuk.com/quest/quest410.exe

This version fixes all bugs that have been reported so far, and also features fully updated documentation and tutorial.

If there are no issues found, this will be the version that is released next weekend, on Sunday 19th July.

So please let me know if you find any bugs!

Posts.EditableText:
Cool, so does this also fix that bug that I reported where if you copy/paste an if statement
It'll sometimes place an } and causes an error? or will this be fixed later?

Also is there a list of fixes? or does this simply fix every single bug?
Posts.HTML:
Cool, so does this also fix that bug that I reported where if you copy/paste an if statement
It'll sometimes place an } and causes an error? or will this be fixed later?

Also is there a list of fixes? or does this simply fix every single bug?

Posts.EditableText:
I did fix a problem in the area of rogue brace characters, so hopefully that bug should be fixed too.

There is a list of changes in versions-qdk.txt in your Program Files\Quest folder, though it doesn't include bugs that were introduced by 4.1 Beta.

If you can reproduce any bugs, please let me know the full steps and I'll fix them before the final release.
